fields.title: Hydraulic leak on press #2
fields.description: There is a hydraulic leak on Press #2, located on the bottom left side. The issue requires the replacement of fittings and a hose. Due to its critical nature, prompt action is necessary to prevent further damage to the equipment

fields.title: Faulty receptacle where fan gets plugged in
fields.description: There is a faulty electrical receptacle in the maintenance area that's affecting the operation of a critical fan unit. Investigate and make the necessary repairs.

fields.title: Preventative Maintenance on Conveyor Belt
fields.description: This work order involves scheduled routine maintenance on the main conveyor belt system. The goal is to ensure smooth operation and extend the equipment's lifespan. The maintenance team will inspect, clean, and lubricate components as needed.
